1.name: East of Eden
1.description: A wilful young man contends against his brother for the attention of their religious father while reconnecting with his estranged mother and falling for his brother's girlfriend.

2.name: Rebel Without a Cause
2.description: A rebellious young man with a troubled past comes to a new town, finding friends and enemies.

3.name: Lady and the Tramp
3.description: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

4.name: To Catch a Thief
4.description: When a reformed jewel thief is suspected of returning to his former occupation, he must ferret out the real thief in order to prove his innocence.

5.name: The Night of the Hunter
5.description: A religious fanatic marries a gullible widow whose young children are reluctant to tell him where their real daddy hid $10,000 he'd stolen in a robbery.

6.name: Oklahoma!
6.description: In Oklahoma, several farmers, cowboys and a traveling salesman compete for the romantic favors of various local ladies.

7.name: Marty
7.description: A middle-aged butcher and a school teacher who have given up on the idea of love meet at a dance and fall for each other.

8.name: Guys and Dolls
8.description: In New York, a gambler is challenged to take a cold female missionary to Havana, but they fall for each other, and the bet has a hidden motive to finance a crap game.

9.name: To Hell and Back
9.description: The true WWII story of Audie Murphy, the most decorated soldier in U.S. history. Based on the autobiography of Audie Murphy who stars as himself in the film.

10.name: The Seven Year Itch
10.description: When his family goes away for the summer, a so far faithful husband is tempted by a beautiful neighbor.

11.name: The Cockleshell Heroes
11.description: During World War II, German ships are "safely" docked upriver at Bordeaux, but the British send a team of kayakers to attack them.

12.name: This Island Earth
12.description: Aliens come to Earth seeking scientists to help them in their war.

13.name: Kiss Me Deadly
13.description: A doomed female hitchhiker pulls Mike Hammer into a deadly whirlpool of intrigue, revolving around a mysterious "great whatsit".

14.name: Les diaboliques
14.description: The wife and mistress of a loathed school principal hatch a plan to murder him while having the perfect alibi. They carry out the plan...but then his body disappears.

15.name: The Trouble with Harry
15.description: The trouble with Harry is that he's dead, and everyone seems to have a different idea of what should be done with his body.

16.name: The Ladykillers
16.description: Five diverse oddball criminal types planning a bank robbery rent rooms on a cul-de-sac from an octogenarian widow under the pretext that they are classical musicians.

17.name: Revenge of the Creature
17.description: Men capture the creature from the Black Lagoon and make him an aquarium attraction, from which he escapes.

18.name: All That Heaven Allows
18.description: An upper-class widow falls in love with a much younger, down-to-earth nurseryman, much to the disapproval of her children and criticism of her country club peers.

19.name: Pather Panchali
19.description: Impoverished priest Harihar Ray, dreaming of a better life for himself and his family, leaves his rural Bengal village in search of work.

20.name: Tarantula
20.description: A spider escapes from an isolated Arizona desert laboratory experimenting in giantism and grows to tremendous size as it wreaks havoc on the local inhabitants.

21.name: Killer's Kiss
21.description: Ready to catch a train to his hometown, a washed up boxer tells us about the strange and twisty events that happened to him the past couple of days.

22.name: The Court Jester
22.description: A hapless carnival performer masquerades as the court jester as part of a plot against an evil ruler who has overthrown the rightful king.

23.name: Mister Roberts
23.description: In the waning days of World War II, the United States Navy cargo ship Reluctant and her crew are stationed in the "backwater" areas of the Pacific Ocean. Trouble ensues when the crew members are granted liberty.

24.name: Bad Day at Black Rock
24.description: A one-armed stranger comes to a tiny town possessing a terrible past they want to keep secret, by violent means if necessary.

25.name: Land of the Pharaohs
25.description: A captured architect designs an ingenious plan to ensure the impregnability of tomb of a self-absorbed Pharaoh, obsessed with the security of his next life.

26.name: Du rififi chez les hommes
26.description: Four men plan a technically perfect crime, but the human element intervenes...

27.name: Blackboard Jungle
27.description: A new English teacher at a violent, unruly inner-city school is determined to do his job, despite resistance from both students and faculty.

28.name: The Man with the Golden Arm
28.description: A strung-out junkie deals with a demoralizing drug addiction while his crippled wife and card sharks pull him down.

29.name: Bride of the Monster
29.description: A mad doctor attempts to create atomic supermen.

30.name: The Dam Busters
30.description: The story of how the British attacked German dams in WWII by using an ingenious technique to drop bombs where they would be most effective.

31.name: Rage at Dawn
31.description: A special agent from Chicago is sent out west to bring in the notorious Reno brothers.

32.name: Strategic Air Command
32.description: An ex-pilot and current baseballer is recalled into the U.S. Air Force and assumes an increasingly important role in Cold War deterrence.

33.name: Man with the Gun
33.description: When a notorious tough 'town tamer' is hired by the citizenry to rid of the gunmen driving them off their land, he finds the local saloon madam to be an old friend.

34.name: It Came from Beneath the Sea
34.description: A giant, radioactive octopus rises from the Philippine Trench to terrorize the North American Pacific Coast.

35.name: Ordet
35.description: Follows the lives of the Borgen family, as they deal with inner conflict, as well as religious conflict with each other, and the rest of the town.

36.name: Wichita
36.description: In 1874, after noticing the total lawlessness in Wichita, Wyatt Earp reluctantly accepts the Marshal's job and runs into the worst local troublemakers.

37.name: Summertime
37.description: A lonely American woman unexpectedly finds romance in Venice, Italy.

38.name: Kismet
38.description: A roguish poet is given the run of the scheming Wazir's harem while pretending to help him usurp the young caliph.

39.name: Love Is a Many-Splendored Thing
39.description: A widowed doctor of both Chinese and European descent falls in love with a married American correspondent in Hong Kong during China's Communist revolution.

40.name: Sommarnattens leende
40.description: In Sweden at the turn of the century, members of the upper class and their servants find themselves in a romantic tangle that they try to work out amidst jealousy and heartbreak.

41.name: We're No Angels
41.description: Three Devil's Island escapees hide out in the house of a kindly merchant and repay his kindness by helping him and his family out of several crises.

42.name: The Man from Laramie
42.description: A stranger, Will Lockhart, defies the local cattle baron and his sadistic son by working for one of his oldest rivals.

43.name: The Quatermass Xperiment
43.description: Professor Bernard Quatermass' manned rocket ship returns to Earth, but two of the astronauts are missing and the survivor seems ill and unable to communicate.

44.name: Richard III
44.description: Shakespeare's powerful tale of the wicked deformed King and his conquests, both on the battlefield and in the boudoir.

45.name: Tall Man Riding
45.description: Larry Madden returns after several years still vowing to avenge himself against the humiliating whipping he received at the hands of cattle baron Tucker Ordway.

46.name: Davy Crockett: King of the Wild Frontier
46.description: Legends (and myths) from the life of famed American frontiersman Davy Crockett are depicted in this feature film edited from television episodes. Crockett and his friend George Russell ...                See full summary »

47.name: La donna più bella del mondo (Lina Cavalieri)
47.description: Rome, 1905. Lina, a music hall singer, has fallen in love with Sergei, a Russian prince. Maestro Doria, who gives her voice lessons and who hopes to make her his mistress, takes her to ...                See full summary »

48.name: The Court-Martial of Billy Mitchell
48.description: A dramatization of the American general and his court martial for publically complaining about High Command's dismissal and neglect of the aerial fighting forces.

49.name: Soldier of Fortune
49.description: When Jane Hoyt's journalist husband disappears in the 1950s China she arrives in Hong Kong determined to find him but meets shady shipping magnate Hank Lee.

50.name: The Indian Fighter
50.description: A scout leading a wagon train through hostile Indian country unwittingly gets involved with a Sioux chief's daughter.
